snippet: Announced deals totaled $169 billion during the first three months of the year, a 17 percent drop compared to the same period in 2011, according to the data provider Thomson Reuters.
abstract: Announced deals totaled $169 billion during the first three months of the year, a 17 percent drop compared to the same period in 2011, according to the data provider Thomson Reuters.

headline.main: Renewed Europe Worries Sap Deal-Makers Confidence
